Description:
What you’ll do
The Network Deployment Specialist focuses upon the deployment, implementation, integration, commissioning/de-commissioning and acceptance testing of any network components and services (e.g. across Mobile Access, Fixed Access and Access TX / 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G) in line with the network infrastructure strategy. The Network Deployment Specialist has a good understanding of established concepts and procedures to deploy and deliver network equipment and services and conduct performance assessments and optimisation. Typically reports to the Network Deployment Manager.

Who you are* Advises on and executes administrative activities related to the implementation and deployment of network equipment, services and infrastructure as per agreed designs/contract service levels;* Supports the team to deliver activities related, but not limited to the smooth rollout of building or upgrading sites and projects that improve cost effectiveness and quality standards;* Uses communication skills to exchange ideas and information in a concise and logical way to support deployment and delivery of network equipment and services and conducting performance assessments and optimisation;* Effectively interacts with colleagues to establish network implementation best practices for Vodafone�s Network and drives efficiency programmes;* Maintains solid relations and works closely with vendors, authorities and other third parties;* Supports collaboration with stakeholders on project timelines and activities in relation to Network infrastructure (eg. SAP, Remedy, Project monitoring);* Supports coordination of demand fulfillment in close alignment with teams, business units and business customers;* Delivers assigned tasks for ensuring general compliance and vendor evaluation controls are maintained (e.g. SOX, ISO, BCP);* Uses best practice knowledge to perform detailed roll out planning, implementation and optimisation of the Network;* Understands the needs and supports the team to follow all procedures, processes and standards related directly to Network Deployment;* Performs other job-related duties or tasks defined by the supervisor or resulting from assigned agendas.Not a perfect fit?Worried that you don’t meet all the desired criteria exactly? At Vodafone we are passionate about Inclusion for All and creating a workplace where everyone can thrive, whatever their personal or professional background. If you’re excited about this role but your experience doesn’t align exactly with every part of the job description, we encourage you to apply as you may be the right candidate for this role or another role, and our recruitment team can help you see how your skills fit in.What's in it for youTogether we canJob Details
